Ecuador cracks down on prisons to restore order after hostage crisisEcuador's police and military on Sunday were aiming to restore order inside the country's dangerous prisons where dozens of staff were held hostage by inmates amid an uptick in violence in the Andean nation. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 16:49:28 GMT AU6X2DSUFNFFTLD3UAIWF2SKXM https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/ecuador-cracks-down-prisons-restore-order-after-hostage-crisis-2024-01-14/Reuters世界美洲
Activists protest at British base in Cyprus used in Yemen strikesPro-Palestinian activists protested at the gates of RAF Akrotiri in Cyprus on Sunday, angry that the British base was used as a launch pad for strikes against the Houthi militia in Yemen. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 14:09:54 GMT JLYIQAMZM5K7HJ7UCZZD2GP6A4 https://www.reuters.com/world/activists-protest-british-base-cyprus-used-yemen-strikes-2024-01-14/Reuters世界
Fierce fighting in Gaza as war hits 100 daysHamas leader Ismail Haniyeh praised the Oct. 7 attack on Israel that killed more than 1,200 people. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 13:52:47 GMT TMMB6H3OVBMLDCHYMY66455G2Y https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/fierce-fighting-gaza-war-hits-100-days-2024-01-14/Nidal Al-Mughrabi, Fadi Shana世界中东
Maldives calls for withdrawal of Indian troops by March 15President Mohamed Muizzu won election last year with a pledge to end the Maldives' "India first" policy, in a region where New Delhi and Beijing compete for influence. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 13:49:21 GMT Y7ORSAO5JZKKXH6QNPSAIGM7UA https://www.reuters.com/world/asia-pacific/maldives-calls-withdrawal-indian-troops-by-march-15-2024-01-14/Mohamed Junayd世界亚太地区
In Gaza, a family suffer painful wait for children's bodiesDaubed in red paint on a fallen wall, the names Omar, Abdullah and Massa mark the spot where the three children were buried alive by an Israeli air strike in the Gaza Strip in November, their relatives say. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 13:34:36 GMT WIDDPSXWYZIQZM2PNZ74A37RDI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/gaza-family-suffer-painful-wait-childrens-bodies-2024-01-14/Fadi Shana, Mohammed Salem世界中东
Guided missile kills Israeli woman, son near Lebanon borderA guided missile launched from Lebanon killed a 76-year-old woman and her son in a village in northern Israel on Sunday, medical officials said, hours after the Israeli military said it killed four heavily armed militants trying to enter from Lebanon. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 12:34:00 GMT 4YXUWNROMFJWLEF6DPIMT7WSEI https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/anti-tank-missile-kills-one-israel-near-lebanon-border-ambulance-service-2024-01-14/Reuters世界中东
Pope Francis says war is in itself a crime against humanityPope Francis said on Sunday war was "a crime against humanity" as he reiterated a call for peace in Ukraine and the Middle East. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 12:32:20 GMT CM5DOHKXTJJ73NHKBWD2I32XCU https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/pope-francis-says-war-is-itself-crime-against- humanity-2024-01-14/Reuters世界欧洲
Russia's ally China needed to end Ukraine war, Swiss diplomat saysUkraine pushed ahead with its peace formula to end nearly two years of war with Russia with a meeting of national security advisers from around the world at the World Economic Forum in Davos. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 12:13:55 GMT VH7SAKGHXBMLXCZMPMWP6PUE5M https://www.reuters.com/world/europe/top-diplomats-meet-davos-ukraine-peace-formula-2024-01-14/Victoria Waldersee, Dmitry Zhdannikov世界欧洲
Mental strain, deepening risks as Israel's war with Hamas reaches 100 daysOne hundred days after Hamas gunmen broke out of Gaza to launch the deadliest attack in Israel's history, tens of thousands of Palestinians have been killed, Gaza lies in ruins and the Middle East is sliding towards a wider, more unpredictable conflict. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 11:35:11 GMT MSFQAXURO5KM7JG3QNFAHQEV64 https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/mental-strain-deepening-risks-israels-war-with-hamas-reaches-100-days-2024-01-14/James Mackenzie世界中东
Guatemala's Arevalo due to assume presidency with difficult path aheadGuatemalan President-elect Bernardo Arevalo is due to be sworn in Sunday for a four-year term, pledging to banish deep-rooted corruption, though he will come up against a divided Congress and string of judicial attempts to block him from wielding power. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 11:03:10 GMT B2VF2KTVJBOJRIFBB4LERIAEI https://www.reuters.com/world/americas/guatemalas-arevalo-due-assume-presidency-with-difficult-path-ahead-2024-01-14/Sofia Menchu世界美洲
Israelis wear dog tags in solidarity with hostages and each otherOn Israeli city streets and on television, in shops and in cafes, one symbol of solidarity with hostages held in Gaza has become ubiquitous in the 100 days since Hamas abducted them: military-style dog tags worn on neckchains. Sun, 14 Jan 2024 10:10:30 GMT YA7O73RHFROOZKWRNGO52NMRDU https://www.reuters.com/world/middle-east/israelis-wear-dog-tags-solidarity-with-hostages-each-other-2024-01-14/Estelle Shirbon世界中东
